    • Constructor Detail

      • H2DatabaseDriver

        public H2DatabaseDriver(H2DatabaseDriver.Type dbType,
                        String path,
                        boolean clearDatabase)
        Constructor for the H2 database driver.
        Parameters:
        dbType - Type of database, either Disk or Memory.
        path - Path to database on disk, or name if type is Memory.
        clearDatabase - Whether to perform a DROP ALL on the database after connecting.

      • getUpsert

        public String getUpsert(String tableName,
                        String[] columns,
                        String[] keyColumns)
        Description copied from class: DatabaseDriver
        Get the SQL for an upsert (merge) on the specified table and columns. An "upsert" updates existing records and inserts where there is no record. Most RDBMSs support some for of upsert, but the syntax is inconsistent. The parameters for the statement should the the specified columns in order. Some databases (like H2) require knowing the key columns we need to use.
        Specified by:
        getUpsert in class DatabaseDriver

      • getStringAggregate

        public String getStringAggregate(String columnName,
                                 String delimiter,
                                 boolean distinct)
        Description copied from class: DatabaseDriver
        Get a string aggregating expression (one that would appear in the SELECT clause of a grouping query. Postgres uses STRING_AGG and H2 use GROUP_CONCAT.
        Specified by:
        getStringAggregate in class DatabaseDriver

      • getTableStats

        public TableStats getTableStats(PredicateInfo predicate)

        Get some statistics for a table.

      • updateDBStats

        public void updateDBStats()
        Description copied from class: DatabaseDriver
        Make sure that all the database-level stats are up-to-date. Is generally called after insertion and indexing.
        Specified by:
